text: |} The Westow Stakes is a Listed flat horse race in Great Britain open to horses aged three years only. It is run at York over a distance of 5 furlongs (), and it is scheduled to take place each year in May. The race was first run in 2009 and was awarded Listed status in 2015. ==Winners== {| class = "sortable" | border="1" style="border-collapse: collapse; font-size:90%" |- bgcolor="#77dd77" align="center" ! style="width:36px" | Year ! style="width:160px" | Winner ! style="width:180px" | Jockey ! style="width:180px" | Trainer ! style="width:60px" | Time |- | 2009 | Anglezarke | David Allan | Tim Easterby | 0:59.97 |- | 2010 | Rose Blossom | Paul Hanagan | Richard Fahey | 0:57.98 |- | 2011 | Night Carnation | Jimmy Fortune | Andrew Balding | 0:58.99 |- | 2012 | Pearl Secret | Jamie Spencer | David Barron | 1:00.49 |- | 2013 | Smoothtalkinrascal | Daniel Tudhope | David O'Meara | 1:01.84 |- | 2014 | Shamshon | Frankie Dettori | Richard Hannon Jr. | 1:01.09 |- | 2015 | Profitable | Adam Kirby | Clive Cox | 0:58.36 |- | 2016 | Easton Angel | Paul Mulrennan | Michael Dods | 0:58.41 |- | 2017 | Fashion Queen | Daniel Tudhope | David O'Meara | 1:00.17 |- | 2018 | Main Desire | Daniel Tudhope | Michael Bell | 0:57.89 |- | 2019 | Garrus | Ryan Moore | Jeremy Noseda | 0:57.61 |- bgcolor="#eeeeee" | data-sort-value="2020" | | no race 2020 || || || | |} == See also == *Horse racing in Great Britain *List of British flat horse races ==References== *Racing Post: **, , , , , , , , , ** Category:Flat horse races for three-year-olds Category:York Racecourse Category:Flat races in Great Britain Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2009 Category:2009 establishments in England
